fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] please approve hours for your worker(s) . Please approve or change the hours submitted by clinking the link [[get_url]] Please do so urgently so that workers can get paid for hours worked. If you cannot access the link simply reply LOGIN to this email and a new link will be sent to you. Alternatively you can submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you!

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours (old shift)
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked on [[shift_end_date]]. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.

fields.name: Contact E-mail Verification
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]], 
You've been registered with [[master_company]]!
Please verify your email by clicking [[email_verification_link]]. 
Best regards, [[manager]]

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked today. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.

fields.name: Forgot password
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

You have requested a password change! Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

We recommend you to change this password on your next login.
You can use the following login details to access it:
Address: [[site_url]]
Username: [[email]]

If there's anything we can do to help about login related issues or if you have any questions about R3sourcer, please let us know. We are happy to help.

Kind regards, R3sourcer team

fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign Reminder
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] we have not yet received your approval for the hours worked on your jobsite today. Please approve or change the hours submitted by clicking the link [[get_url]] or open on your computer https://crm.labourking.com.au -> Customer access. Please note failure to do so, will result in workers not getting paid for today, and can affect the price of your next order. If you have any issues please contact [[portfolio_manager]] [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]] immediately. Thank you

fields.name: Trial User Register
fields.message_html_template: Hi there, Thanks for signing up! You’re just one step away from fully activating your new R3SOURC3R trial account. Please hit the verification button below, enter your details and experience our cloud-based software! Username: [[contact__email]] Password: [[password]]
